sections.title: Introduction to Angles
sections.content:
An ANGLE is formed when two rays meet at a common point called the VERTEX.

Key Terms:
• VERTEX: The point where two rays meet
• ARMS: The two rays forming the angle
• Measured in DEGREES (°)
• Symbol: ∠ABC or ∠B (vertex letter in middle)

Types of Angles by Size:

1. ACUTE ANGLE:
   • Between 0° and 90°
   • Sharp, pointed
   • Example: 45°, 60°, 30°

2. RIGHT ANGLE:
   • Exactly 90°
   • Marked with small square □
   • Forms perfect "L" shape
   • Example: Corner of book

3. OBTUSE ANGLE:
   • Between 90° and 180°
   • Wider than right angle
   • Example: 120°, 150°, 95°

4. STRAIGHT ANGLE:
   • Exactly 180°
   • Forms a straight line
   • Example: Flat surface

5. REFLEX ANGLE:
   • Between 180° and 360°
   • Greater than straight angle
   • Example: 270°, 200°, 315°

6. COMPLETE/FULL ROTATION:
   • Exactly 360°
   • Full circle
   • Back to starting position

Measuring Angles:
• Use a PROTRACTOR
• Place center point on vertex
• Align one arm with 0° line
• Read where other arm crosses scale
• Always specify unit: degrees (°)

Angles in Daily Life:
• Clock hands form different angles
• Door opening creates angles
• Ramps and slopes
• Corners of shapes
• Turning directions
sections.content_zh:
角是当两条射线在一个称为顶点的公共点相遇时形成的。

关键术语：
• 顶点：两条射线相遇的点
• 边：形成角的两条射线
• 以度（°）为单位测量
• 符号：∠ABC或∠B（顶点字母在中间）

按大小分类的角：

1. 锐角：
   • 在0°和90°之间
   • 尖锐，尖的
   • 例子：45°，60°，30°

2. 直角：
   • 正好90°
   • 用小正方形□标记
   • 形成完美的

形
   • 例子：书的角

3. 钝角：
   • 在90°和180°之间
   • 比直角宽
   • 例子：120°，150°，95°

4. 平角：
   • 正好180°
   • 形成直线
   • 例子：平坦表面

5. 优角：
   • 在180°和360°之间
   • 大于平角
   • 例子：270°，200°，315°

6. 完整/全旋转：
   • 正好360°
   • 完整的圆
   • 回到起始位置

测量角：
• 使用量角器
• 将中心点放在顶点上
• 将一条边与0°线对齐
• 读取另一条边穿过刻度的位置
• 始终指定单位：度（°）

日常生活中的角：
• 时钟指针形成不同的角
• 门打开产生角
• 坡道和斜坡
• 形状的角
• 转向方向

sections.title: Angle Properties at a Point
sections.content:
ANGLES AT A POINT:
Angles around a single point add up to 360°.

Why? Because going all the way around makes a full rotation (360°).

Example 1:
Three angles meet at point O: 120°, 150°, and x°
120° + 150° + x° = 360°
270° + x° = 360°
x° = 360° - 270° = 90°

ANGLES ON A STRAIGHT LINE:
Angles on a straight line add up to 180°.

Why? Because a straight line is a 180° angle.

Example 2:
Two angles form a straight line: 70° and y°
70° + y° = 180°
y° = 180° - 70° = 110°

VERTICALLY OPPOSITE ANGLES:
When two straight lines cross, opposite angles are equal.

Why? Because angles on a line = 180°, so opposite angles must be equal.

Example 3:
Two lines cross. One angle is 65°.
Vertically opposite angle = 65° (equal)
Adjacent angles = 180° - 65° = 115° each

ADJACENT ANGLES:
Angles next to each other, sharing a common arm.

COMPLEMENTARY ANGLES:
Two angles that add up to 90° (form a right angle).

Example: 30° and 60° are complementary
30° + 60° = 90°

SUPPLEMENTARY ANGLES:
Two angles that add up to 180° (form a straight line).

Example: 110° and 70° are supplementary
110° + 70° = 180°

Problem-Solving Strategy:
1. Identify which angle property applies
2. Write an equation
3. Solve for unknown angle
4. Check: Do angles add up correctly?
sections.content_zh:
一点的角：
围绕单个点的角加起来等于360°。

为什么？因为绕一整圈形成完整旋转（360°）。

例1：
三个角在点O相遇：120°，150°和x°
120° + 150° + x° = 360°
270° + x° = 360°
x° = 360° - 270° = 90°

直线上的角：
直线上的角加起来等于180°。

为什么？因为直线是180°角。

例2：
两个角形成直线：70°和y°
70° + y° = 180°
y° = 180° - 70° = 110°

对顶角：
当两条直线相交时，对角相等。

为什么？因为直线上的角 = 180°，所以对角必须相等。

例3：
两条线相交。一个角是65°。
对顶角 = 65°（相等）
邻角 = 180° - 65° = 115°（每个）

邻角：
彼此相邻的角，共享一条公共边。

互补角：
两个加起来等于90°的角（形成直角）。

例子：30°和60°互补
30° + 60° = 90°

补角：
两个加起来等于180°的角（形成直线）。

例子：110°和70°互补
110° + 70° = 180°

解题策略：
1. 识别适用哪个角性质
2. 写方程
3. 求解未知角
4. 检查：角加起来正确吗？

sections.title: Parallel Lines and Transversals
sections.content:
PARALLEL LINES: Lines that never meet, always same distance apart.
Symbol: ||  (e.g., line AB || line CD)

TRANSVERSAL: A line that crosses two or more parallel lines.

When a transversal crosses parallel lines, special angle relationships form:

1. CORRESPONDING ANGLES (F-pattern):
   • In same position at each intersection
   • Equal when lines are parallel
   • Form "F" shape
   • Example: If one corresponding angle is 70°, the other is also 70°

2. ALTERNATE INTERIOR ANGLES (Z-pattern):
   • Inside the parallel lines, on opposite sides of transversal
   • Equal when lines are parallel
   • Form "Z" shape
   • Example: If one is 110°, its alternate is also 110°

3. ALTERNATE EXTERIOR ANGLES:
   • Outside the parallel lines, on opposite sides
   • Equal when lines are parallel

4. INTERIOR ANGLES ON SAME SIDE (C-pattern):
   • Inside parallel lines, same side of transversal
   • Add up to 180° (supplementary)
   • Form "C" or "U" shape
   • Example: If one is 70°, the other is 180° - 70° = 110°

How to Identify:
• Look for the letter patterns: F, Z, C
• Corresponding: Same position = F pattern
• Alternate interior: Opposite sides, between lines = Z pattern
• Co-interior: Same side, between lines = C pattern

Example Problem:
Two parallel lines cut by transversal.
One angle is 65°.

Find:
• Corresponding angle = 65° (equal)
• Alternate interior = 65° (equal)
• Co-interior = 180° - 65° = 115° (supplementary)
• Vertically opposite = 65° (equal)

Common Mistake:
Don't confuse co-interior (add to 180°) with alternate interior (equal)!

Real Applications:
• Railway tracks (parallel lines)
• Ladder against wall
• Road crossings
• Architectural designs
sections.content_zh:
平行线：永不相遇的线，始终保持相同距离。
符号：|| （例如，线AB || 线CD）

横截线：穿过两条或多条平行线的线。

当横截线穿过平行线时，形成特殊的角关系：

1. 同位角（F型）：
   • 在每个交点处的相同位置
   • 当线平行时相等
   • 形成

形
   • 例子：如果一个同位角是70°，另一个也是70°

2. 内错角（Z型）：
   • 在平行线内部，横截线的相对侧
   • 当线平行时相等
   • 形成

形
   • 例子：如果一个是110°，它的内错角也是110°

3. 外错角：
   • 在平行线外部，相对侧
   • 当线平行时相等

4. 同侧内角（C型）：
   • 在平行线内部，横截线的同侧
   • 加起来等于180°（补角）
   • 形成

形
   • 例子：如果一个是70°，另一个是180° - 70° = 110°

如何识别：
• 寻找字母模式：F、Z、C
• 同位角：相同位置 = F型
• 内错角：相对侧，在线之间 = Z型
• 同侧内角：同侧，在线之间 = C型

例题：
两条平行线被横截线切割。
一个角是65°。

求：
• 同位角 = 65°（相等）
• 内错角 = 65°（相等）
• 同侧内角 = 180° - 65° = 115°（补角）
• 对顶角 = 65°（相等）

常见错误：
不要混淆同侧内角（加到180°）和内错角（相等）！

实际应用：
• 铁轨（平行线）
• 靠墙的梯子
• 道路交叉口
• 建筑设计

sections.title: Triangle Angle Sum
sections.explanation:
ANGLE SUM OF TRIANGLE:
The three interior angles of ANY triangle always add up to 180°.

Why? You can prove this using parallel lines:
• Draw a line parallel to the base through the top vertex
• Alternate angles show that all three angles fit on a straight line (180°)

Examples:

Example 1:
Triangle has angles 50°, 60°, and x°
50° + 60° + x° = 180°
110° + x° = 180°
x° = 70°

Example 2:
Isosceles triangle (two equal angles)
Base angles = 70° each, find apex angle
70° + 70° + apex = 180°
140° + apex = 180°
apex = 40°

Example 3:
Right-angled triangle (one angle = 90°)
One angle = 90°, another = 35°, find third
90° + 35° + third = 180°
125° + third = 180°
third = 55°

EXTERIOR ANGLE OF TRIANGLE:
An exterior angle equals the sum of the two opposite interior angles.

Why?
• Interior + Exterior on line = 180° (supplementary)
• Sum of all three interior = 180°
• Therefore, exterior = sum of two opposite interior

Example 4:
Triangle has interior angles 40° and 70°
Exterior angle at third vertex = 40° + 70° = 110°

Check: Third interior = 180° - 40° - 70° = 70°
Exterior = 180° - 70° = 110° ✓

Types of Triangles by Angles:
• ACUTE: All three angles < 90°
• RIGHT: One angle = 90°
• OBTUSE: One angle > 90°

Types by Sides:
• EQUILATERAL: All sides equal → all angles = 60°
• ISOSCELES: Two sides equal → two angles equal
• SCALENE: All sides different → all angles different
sections.explanation_zh:
三角形内角和：
任何三角形的三个内角总和总是等于180°。

为什么？你可以用平行线证明这一点：
• 通过顶点画一条平行于底边的线
• 内错角表明所有三个角都在直线上（180°）

例子：

例1：
三角形的角是50°，60°和x°
50° + 60° + x° = 180°
110° + x° = 180°
x° = 70°

例2：
等腰三角形（两个相等的角）
底角 = 每个70°，求顶角
70° + 70° + 顶角 = 180°
140° + 顶角 = 180°
顶角 = 40°

例3：
直角三角形（一个角 = 90°）
一个角 = 90°，另一个 = 35°，求第三个
90° + 35° + 第三个 = 180°
125° + 第三个 = 180°
第三个 = 55°

三角形外角：
外角等于两个相对内角的和。

为什么？
• 内角 + 外角在线上 = 180°（补角）
• 所有三个内角的和 = 180°
• 因此，外角 = 两个相对内角的和

例4：
三角形的内角是40°和70°
第三个顶点的外角 = 40° + 70° = 110°

检查：第三个内角 = 180° - 40° - 70° = 70°
外角 = 180° - 70° = 110° ✓

按角分类的三角形：
• 锐角：所有三个角 < 90°
• 直角：一个角 = 90°
• 钝角：一个角 > 90°

按边分类：
• 等边：所有边相等 → 所有角 = 60°
• 等腰：两边相等 → 两角相等
• 不等边：所有边不同 → 所有角不同

sections.title: Angles in Polygons
sections.content:
POLYGON: A closed figure with straight sides.

Types of Polygons:
• Triangle: 3 sides
• Quadrilateral: 4 sides
• Pentagon: 5 sides
• Hexagon: 6 sides
• Heptagon: 7 sides
• Octagon: 8 sides
• Nonagon: 9 sides
• Decagon: 10 sides
• n-gon: n sides

SUM OF INTERIOR ANGLES:
Formula: (n - 2) × 180°
where n = number of sides

Why? Any polygon can be divided into (n - 2) triangles from one vertex.
Each triangle has 180°, so total = (n - 2) × 180°

Examples:

Quadrilateral (n = 4):
(4 - 2) × 180° = 2 × 180° = 360°

Pentagon (n = 5):
(5 - 2) × 180° = 3 × 180° = 540°

Hexagon (n = 6):
(6 - 2) × 180° = 4 × 180° = 720°

Octagon (n = 8):
(8 - 2) × 180° = 6 × 180° = 1080°

REGULAR POLYGONS:
All sides and angles are equal.

Each interior angle of regular polygon:
= [(n - 2) × 180°] / n

Examples:

Equilateral triangle (n = 3):
Each angle = [(3 - 2) × 180°] / 3 = 180° / 3 = 60°

Square (n = 4):
Each angle = [(4 - 2) × 180°] / 4 = 360° / 4 = 90°

Regular hexagon (n = 6):
Each angle = [(6 - 2) × 180°] / 6 = 720° / 6 = 120°

Regular octagon (n = 8):
Each angle = [(8 - 2) × 180°] / 8 = 1080° / 8 = 135°

EXTERIOR ANGLES:
Sum of exterior angles of ANY polygon = 360° (always!)

For regular polygon:
Each exterior angle = 360° / n

Examples:
Regular hexagon: Each exterior = 360° / 6 = 60°
Regular pentagon: Each exterior = 360° / 5 = 72°

Relationship:
Interior angle + Exterior angle = 180° (on a straight line)

Problem-Solving:

Question: A regular polygon has each exterior angle = 40°. How many sides?
Solution: 
360° / n = 40°
n = 360° / 40° = 9 sides (nonagon)

Question: Pentagon has angles 100°, 110°, 120°, 95°, and x°. Find x.
Solution:
Sum = (5 - 2) × 180° = 540°
100 + 110 + 120 + 95 + x = 540
425 + x = 540
x = 115°

sections.title: Special Quadrilaterals
sections.content:
QUADRILATERAL: Any 4-sided polygon. Interior angles sum = 360°.

Special Quadrilaterals and Their Properties:

1. SQUARE:
   • All 4 sides equal
   • All 4 angles = 90°
   • Diagonals equal, bisect each other at 90°
   • 4 lines of symmetry

2. RECTANGLE:
   • Opposite sides equal and parallel
   • All 4 angles = 90°
   • Diagonals equal and bisect each other
   • 2 lines of symmetry

3. PARALLELOGRAM:
   • Opposite sides equal and parallel
   • Opposite angles equal
   • Adjacent angles add to 180° (supplementary)
   • Diagonals bisect each other (but not equal)

4. RHOMBUS:
   • All 4 sides equal
   • Opposite angles equal
   • Opposite sides parallel
   • Diagonals bisect each other at 90° (but not equal)
   • 2 lines of symmetry

5. TRAPEZIUM:
   • One pair of parallel sides (called bases)
   • Other pair not parallel (called legs)
   • No other special properties in general trapezium
   • Isosceles trapezium: legs equal, base angles equal

6. KITE:
   • Two pairs of adjacent sides equal
   • One pair of opposite angles equal (between unequal sides)
   • Diagonals meet at 90°
   • One diagonal bisects the other
   • 1 line of symmetry

Angle Properties in Parallelograms:
• Opposite angles equal: ∠A = ∠C, ∠B = ∠D
• Adjacent angles supplementary: ∠A + ∠B = 180°

Example:
Parallelogram has one angle = 110°
• Opposite angle = 110°
• Adjacent angles = 180° - 110° = 70° each
• Four angles: 110°, 70°, 110°, 70°
• Check: 110 + 70 + 110 + 70 = 360° ✓

Hierarchy:
• Square is a special rectangle (all sides equal)
• Rectangle is a special parallelogram (right angles)
• Rhombus is a special parallelogram (all sides equal)
• Square is also a special rhombus (right angles)
• All these are quadrilaterals

Identifying Quadrilaterals:
Ask these questions:
1. Are all sides equal? → Could be square or rhombus
2. Are all angles 90°? → Could be square or rectangle
3. Are opposite sides parallel? → Could be parallelogram or its special types
4. Only one pair parallel? → Trapezium
5. Two pairs of adjacent equal? → Kite
sections.content_zh:
四边形：任何4边多边形。内角和 = 360°。

特殊四边形及其性质：

1. 正方形：
   • 所有4边相等
   • 所有4角 = 90°
   • 对角线相等，以90°相互平分
   • 4条对称轴

2. 矩形：
   • 对边相等且平行
   • 所有4角 = 90°
   • 对角线相等并相互平分
   • 2条对称轴

3. 平行四边形：
   • 对边相等且平行
   • 对角相等
   • 邻角和为180°（补角）
   • 对角线相互平分（但不相等）

4. 菱形：
   • 所有4边相等
   • 对角相等
   • 对边平行
   • 对角线以90°相互平分（但不相等）
   • 2条对称轴

5. 梯形：
   • 一对平行边（称为底）
   • 另一对不平行（称为腰）
   • 一般梯形无其他特殊性质
   • 等腰梯形：腰相等，底角相等

6. 风筝：
   • 两对相邻边相等
   • 一对对角相等（在不等边之间）
   • 对角线以90°相交
   • 一条对角线平分另一条
   • 1条对称轴

平行四边形的角性质：
• 对角相等：∠A = ∠C，∠B = ∠D
• 邻角互补：∠A + ∠B = 180°

例子：
平行四边形的一个角 = 110°
• 对角 = 110°
• 邻角 = 180° - 110° = 70°（每个）
• 四个角：110°，70°，110°，70°
• 检查：110 + 70 + 110 + 70 = 360° ✓

层次结构：
• 正方形是特殊的矩形（所有边相等）
• 矩形是特殊的平行四边形（直角）
• 菱形是特殊的平行四边形（所有边相等）
• 正方形也是特殊的菱形（直角）
• 所有这些都是四边形

识别四边形：
问这些问题：
1. 所有边相等吗？→ 可能是正方形或菱形
2. 所有角都是90°吗？→ 可能是正方形或矩形
3. 对边平行吗？→ 可能是平行四边形或其特殊类型
4. 只有一对平行吗？→ 梯形
5. 两对相邻边相等吗？→ 风筝

exercises.explanation: 125° is between 90° and 180°, so it's an obtuse angle.

exercises.prompt: Angles on a straight line: 75° and x°. Find x.
exercises.hint: Angles on a straight line add up to 180°.
exercises.hint_zh: 直线上的角加起来等于180°。

exercises.prompt: Two lines intersect. One angle is 50°. What is the vertically opposite angle?
exercises.prompt_zh: 两条线相交。一个角是50°。对顶角是多少？
exercises.explanation: Vertically opposite angles are always equal, so it's also 50°.
exercises.explanation_zh: 对顶角总是相等，所以也是50°。

exercises.prompt: A triangle has angles 45°, 65°, and x°. Find x.
exercises.prompt_zh: 一个三角形的角是45°，65°和x°。求x。
exercises.hint: Angles in a triangle add up to 180°.

exercises.prompt: What is the sum of interior angles of a hexagon?
exercises.prompt_zh: 六边形的内角和是多少？

exercises.prompt: Each interior angle of a regular pentagon is how many degrees?
exercises.prompt_zh: 正五边形的每个内角是多少度？

exercises.prompt: In a parallelogram, one angle is 70°. What are the other three angles?
exercises.prompt_zh: 在平行四边形中，一个角是70°。其他三个角是多少？
exercises.hint: Opposite angles are equal, adjacent angles add to 180°.
exercises.explanation: Opposite angle = 70°. Adjacent angles = 180° - 70° = 110° each. So: 70°, 110°, 70°, 110°, but choice shows three others: 70°, 110°, 110°.

exercises.prompt: Which quadrilaterals always have all angles equal to 90°?
exercises.prompt_zh: 哪些四边形的所有角总是等于90°？
exercises.hint: Think about which shapes have right angles at all corners.
exercises.hint_zh: 想想哪些形状在所有角都是直角。
exercises.explanation: Square and rectangle always have four 90° angles. Rhombus and parallelogram generally don't (unless they're also rectangles).
exercises.explanation_zh: 正方形和矩形总是有四个90°角。菱形和平行四边形通常没有（除非它们也是矩形）。

exercises.prompt: Parallel lines cut by transversal. One alternate interior angle is 65°. What is the other alternate interior angle?
exercises.prompt_zh: 平行线被横截线切割。一个内错角是65°。另一个内错角是多少？
exercises.hint: Alternate interior angles on parallel lines are equal.
exercises.hint_zh: 平行线上的内错角相等。
exercises.explanation: Alternate interior angles are equal when lines are parallel, so both are 65°.
exercises.explanation_zh: 当线平行时内错角相等，所以两个都是65°。

exercises.prompt: Order these angle types from smallest to largest degree range:
exercises.prompt_zh: 从最小到最大度数范围排列这些角类型：

exercises.prompt: A regular polygon has each exterior angle = 45°. How many sides does it have?
exercises.prompt_zh: 正多边形的每个外角 = 45°。它有多少边？
exercises.hint: Use: 360° ÷ exterior angle = number of sides
exercises.hint_zh: 使用：360° ÷ 外角 = 边数
